total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that are surrounded by 1s on all four sides (up, down, left, and right).
Q2: Replace the identified cells from Q1 with the number 3 in the output grid.
Q3: If a cell is not surrounded by 1s on all four sides, keep the original value from the input grid in the output grid.
